General.Name: Daesung Microbiological Labs. Co. Ltd
General.Description: Daesung Microbiological Labs. Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells vaccines for swine, poultry, canine, cattle, and fish in South Korea. It offers antibiotics and antibacterials, parasiticides and disinfectants, probiotics and enzyme products, and nutrients and pharmaceuticals. The company also exports its products. Daesung Microbiological Labs. Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1966 and is headquartered in Uiwang-si, South Korea.
